author: MegaBuilds
description:
This military megaproject took 10 years to build and fell in just over a month. An over 700 km line of towering concrete forts, from the low-level plains near the English Channel to the treacherous cliffs of the Alps. 

So, how did this megaproject fail so, so badly?

For more megaprojects content, be sure to subscribe to MegaBuilds!

0:00 Why France’s Mega Wall Didn’t Stop Hitler
0:58 The Devastation of WW1
2:29 The Maginot Line
4:05 Construction of the Maginot Line
5:33 Challenging Parts of the Maginot Line
12:10 What Went Wrong?
